actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize a limited waiver of the child labor provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to certain agricultural hand harvest laborers.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to grant a waiver of the child labor provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act with respect to agricultural hand harvest laborers below the age of 12.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a limited waiver of the child labor provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to certain agricultural hand harvest laborers.
